name: Cult Of the Сelestial Knight
description:
PLOT

You are a nun who needs to put a candle on the altar to protect the monastery from evil monsters.

But you are disturbed by the wind that blows every 10 seconds. Don't let evil monsters and wind extinguish the last light in the monastery.

CONTROLS:

Press AD to avoid the wind.

Click LMB on the monsters that are trying to scare you.

Press LMB or SPACE on enemy attacks during battle to defeat monsters.
